meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of tourism
meanings.sent1: The touristically themed hotel had maps of the city in every room.
meanings.sent2: The touristic attractions in the area drew many visitors each year.
meanings.sent3: The touristically decorated bus made everyone feel like they were on vacation.
meanings.sent4: The touristically designed brochures showcased the best spots for sightseeing.
meanings.sent5: The touristically inspired souvenirs captured the essence of the destination.

meanings.definition: in a manner suitable for or typical of tourists
meanings.sent1: She dressed touristically in a Hawaiian shirt and sunglasses.
meanings.sent2: They explored the city touristically, taking photos at every landmark.
meanings.sent3: He ate touristically, trying all the local delicacies in one day.
meanings.sent4: The guide spoke touristically, pointing out the best spots for shopping.
meanings.sent5: The family traveled touristically, following the guided tours at each stop.
